title: Volcano tourism is booming, but is it too risky?
description: Dazzling eruptions draw visitors to places like Iceland and Hawaii. Here’s how to see them safely.
content:
On June 2, 2025, Italys Mount Etna, one of Earths most active volcanoes, erupted again, releasing what experts called a lava fountain that sent tourists rushing downhill to safety.
